constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 126 (Monday, July 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BURGESS:
H.R. 4512.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The attached legislation falls under Congress' enumerated
constitutional authority to regulate the postal system
pursuant to Article I, Section 8, Clause 7.
[Page H3669]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: Semipostal Stamp Clarification Act of 2021
